name: TurkeyRun
description:
My personal goal for this game jam was to use custom animation on a custom skeleton for a custom-made 3D model of a turkey. I used 3D Studio Max's standard primitives to create a STUPID 3D model, then used Max's CAT rigging system to create a custom skeleton, then used CAT animation and keyframe animation to create an idle and walk animation.

CREDITS:

3D Model of turkey: Brian Heagney
Turkey Animation: Brian Heagney
Puzzle / Level Design: Brian Heagney
Programming: Brian Heagney
